casebody.data:
RICHARDSON
v.
DEPT. OF PUBLIC INST. No. 642A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 12, 2005. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Public Instruction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of March 2005 by Plaintiff Requesting Rationale and Motion Requesting Ruling Justices:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2005."
